      • VerifyMessage.VerifiableMessage

        public VerifyMessage.VerifiableMessage(long superstep,
                               long sourceVertexId,
                               float value)
        Constructor with verifiable arguments.
        参数:
        superstep - Superstep this message was created on.
        sourceVertexId - Who send this message.
        value - A value associated with this message.
